attributes.action: create more afordable housing for our young people!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The majority of young people today cannot afford the high cost of buying a house,a situation that is getting worse by the day,is there nothing that can be done to help them?can the government not provide interest free loans,for say 5 years,to get them on the property ladder?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
